label: Travel and Tourism
description: Market category encompassing search queries related to travel and tourism.

subcategories.label: Hotels and Accommodations
subcategories.description: Subcategory encompassing search queries related to finding and booking hotels and other accommodations.

subcategories.label: Holiday Packages
subcategories.description: Subcategory encompassing search queries related to booking holiday packages that include flights, accommodations, and other activities.

subcategories.label: Attractions and Activities
subcategories.description: Subcategory encompassing search queries related to buying tickets and booking activities at tourist attractions.

subcategories.label: Transportation
subcategories.description: Subcategory encompassing search queries related to booking transportation for travel.

subcategories.label: Destinations
subcategories.description: Subcategory encompassing search queries related to exploring and learning about travel destinations.
